Class SortBy

java.lang.Object
com.instancesobp.batchingAlgorithm.sortOrderList.SortBy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<Order>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SortByRandom, SortByWeight
public abstract class SortBy extends Object implements Comparator<Order>
Abstract base class for sorting a list of orders based on specific criteria. This class provides a framework for implementing custom sorting algorithms for orders in a warehouse. Subclasses must define the sorting logic and the value used for comparison.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergio Gil Borr√°s

  • Constructor Details

    • SortBy

      public SortBy()
      Default constructor for the SortBy class. This constructor initializes the sorting algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public abstract List<Order> run(List<Order> orderList)
      Sorts a list of orders based on the implemented sorting criteria. Subclasses must implement this method to define the sorting logic.
      Parameters:
      orderList - The list of orders to be sorted.
      Returns:
      A sorted list of orders based on the implemented criteria.

    • getValue

      public abstract Double getValue(Order order)
      Retrieves the value used for comparison for a given order. Subclasses must implement this method to define the value used for sorting the orders.
      Parameters:
      order - The order for which the comparison value is retrieved.
      Returns:
      The value used for comparison.
